titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5818) to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make loans to States to acquire foreclosed housing and to make grants to States for related costs.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-621, by Ms. Castor.

All points of order against the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute are waived except those arising under clause 10 of rule XXI. Notwithstanding clause 11 of rule XVIII, no amendment to the committee amendment in the nature of a substitute shall be in order except those printed in the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 214.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1174.
DEBATE - The House resumed debate on H. Res. 1174.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 1174, the Chair put the question of adoption on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Hastings (WA) demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 187 (Roll no. 287).
Mr. Simpson moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Hastings (FL) moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 186 (Roll no. 288).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 192 (Roll no. 289).

action.text: Mrs. Emerson moved to reconsider the vote.
Mr. Welch (VT) moved to table the motion to reconsider the vote
On motion to table the motion to reconsider the vote Agreed to by recorded vote: 212 - 183 (Roll no. 290).

bill.summary:
5/6/2008--Introduced.
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5818) to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make loans to States to acquire foreclosed housing and to make grants to States for related costs.
